title: Knife, ca. 1680–1700
inscribed: On ferrule: W v D S
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Straight-sided blade with upper edge pointing towards the lower edge; plain bolster. Silver ferrule engraved with initials "W v D S." Ivory handle carved in deep relief. Three virtues: Justice, with sword and scale, Hope, with anchor and bird, and Charity with candle (?) and three children. Four faces on top end of handle; cap of handle floral-shaped.

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, ca. 1680–1700.
ca. 1680–1700. ivory, silver, steel. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-167.
